title: Hanagara Tsumi
sinopse:
Shuu's partner at work is none other than Ayame, his ex-bully, Alpha senior from middle and high school. The same Ayame that used to call him, an omega, out and toy with him over really trivial things. Shuu just wants a peaceful life, but is that really possible now with this reunion?!?!

(Source: Rose Squad Scans)
